content: to 1st double wrapped stitch p double wrapped stitch w&t repeat row 7 & 8 until one double wrapped stitch remains at each end of work row 9 rs sl 1 k to double-wrapped stitch k double-wrapped stitch do not turn work drop one strand of mc and knit again in stockinette with one strand each of mc and cc picking up the last double-wrapped stitch when you come to it pattern for personal use only last revised july 2013 knit for 20 row/4 inches all images and text © mackenzie sasser 2013
